hero.forming_leaders: Forming leaders for the Kingdom for
hero.choose_modality: Choose your modality: On-site, Online, or Blended with live classes

modalities.presencial_desc: On-site classes with qualified teachers, direct interaction, and networking with other students.
modalities.ead_desc: Study at your own pace with high-quality recorded classes, available 24 hours a day.
modalities.semi_desc: The best of both worlds: flexibility of online learning with one live class per week.

live.title: LIVE CLASS WEEKLY
live.desc: In the Blended modality, you have access to one live class per week with our teachers. Ask questions in real-time, interact with other students, and have a unique learning experience.
live.recording_desc: Watch later if you miss it

welcome.continue_learning: Continue your learning journey at FAITEL. You are doing great!

items.new_module_desc: Eschatology module is now available for access
items.exams_week_desc: Second semester exams start on December 15th
items.recess_desc: Platform will be on recess from Dec 24th to Jan 2nd

course_card.default_desc: Complete theology course with exclusive didactic material

about.title: 23 YEARS OF EXCELLENCE
about.p1: Founded by Pastor Valdinei, FAITEL was born as a theological seminary with the vision of forming Christian leaders committed to the Word of God.
about.p2: Today we are a Theological Faculty of excellence, hand in hand with WST Publishing and Graphics, producing our own exclusive teaching materials.

t1.text: FAITEL transformed my ministry. The theological depth and practicality of the teachings were fundamental.

t2.text: The blended modality allowed me to continue my studies even on the mission field. The live classes are amazing!

t3.text: Complete formation uniting theory and practice. The teaching materials from WST Publishing are top quality.

cta.desc: Choose the modality that best fits your routine and transform your calling into knowledge.
cta.whatsapp_message: Hello! I would like more information about FAITEL courses.

footer.rights: ¬© 2024 FAITEL - Theological Faculty. All rights reserved.

banner.slide5_subtitle: On-site, Online or Blended - you choose your journey
banner.slide6_subtitle: Empower yourself to fulfill the Great Commission - Matthew 28:19

certifications.description: FAITEL is an institution committed to excellence in theological education, recognized by important educational and ministerial bodies.

cec.name: CEC
cec.desc: Body responsible for the evaluation and certification of theological courses in accordance with evangelical educational standards.

cemadeb.name: CEMADEB
cemadeb.full_name: Evangelical Convention of Assembly of God Ministers
cemadeb.desc: Convention gathering ministers and churches of the Assemblies of God, ensuring legitimacy and ministerial recognition.

thelma.name: Pastor Thelma Santana Menezes Santos
thelma.desc: Leader committed to excellence in educational management and Christian leader development.

devotional.title: ‚òï DEVOTIONAL COFFEE
devotional.subtitle: WITH THE CHANCELLOR
devotional.verse: "For I know the thoughts that I think toward you, says the LORD, thoughts of peace and not of evil, to give you a future and a hope."
devotional.reflection_p1: Dear brothers and sisters, today I want to share a word of hope and faith. God has wonderful plans for each of us. No matter what challenges you are facing right now, know that the Lord is in control of all things.
devotional.reflection_p2: He knows your dreams, your needs, and your pains. And more than that, He has thoughts of peace for you! Don't give up! Keep trusting, praying, and seeking God's presence. The best is yet to come!
devotional.blessing: May God richly bless your day! üôå
devotional.signature_role: Chancellor of FAITEL | President CEMADEB | President IADMA

board.title: HIGH INTERNATIONAL BOARD
board.description: A visionary and anointed leadership, divinely established to break boundaries and govern the expansion of theological education in Europe and the nations. Men and women of authority, strategically positioned to build the Kingdom with excellence and power.

etienne.name: Pr. B.A. Etienne Claude dos Santos de Souza

handerson.name: Pr. B.A. Jos√© Handerson Costa de Oliveira
